=== Current Position ===
(Left is decreasing x, Right is increasing x, Up is decreasing y, Down is increasing y)
(row = 9, col = 3)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 9, col = 3)

Since your avatar has not changed position from the last state, I will analyze the current surroundings to determine the best action to take. 

In the current state at position (row = 9, col = 3):
- To the Left (row = 9, col = 2) is a background dirt.
- To the Right (row = 9, col = 4) is an item diamond (*).
- Above (row = 8, col = 3) is a background dirt.
- Below (row = 10, col = 3) is a boulder (@).

Given that the objective is to collect diamonds without exceeding 9 and find a way towards the exit, moving Right to collect the diamond would be beneficial.

Thus, I choose to take the action to move right:

``` Action:3 ```

This action should allow me to collect a diamond, thereby moving towards my objective while maintaining awareness of the limits on the diamond count as I proceed through the level.
